policies.return_policy: Customers can request a return within 14 days of delivery. Return shipping is free for damaged goods.
policies.shipping_policy: We offer Standard (3-5 days), Express (1-2 days), and International shipping. Tracking is available for all services.
policies.refund_policy: Refunds are issued within 5 business days after inspection of returned items.

services.name: International Shipping
services.description: Delivery in 5-10 business days, depending on location

faqs.question: How do I track my shipment?
faqs.answer: You can track your shipment using the tracking number provided in your confirmation email at swiftship.com/track

faqs.question: What should I do if my package is delayed?
faqs.answer: Delays can occur due to weather or customs. If your package is over 3 days late, contact our support team.

faqs.question: How do I change my delivery address?
faqs.answer: Contact support within 12 hours of placing your order to request an address change.

faqs.question: Can I insure my shipment?
faqs.answer: Yes, insurance is available at checkout for an additional fee based on the declared value of the item.

faqs.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
faqs.answer: Orders typically arrive within 3-7 business days, depending on your location and selected shipping method.

faqs.question: What shipping methods do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer standard, expedited, and express shipping options. Shipping carriers include FedEx, UPS, and USPS.

faqs.question: Do you offer express or expedited shipping options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer both express and expedited shipping. Express delivers in 1-2 business days, while expedited takes 2-3 days.

faqs.question: What are your shipping rates?
faqs.answer: Shipping rates vary based on weight, destination, and method. Rates are calculated at checkout.

faqs.question: What's the difference between standard shipping and expedited shipping?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, while expedited typically arrives in 2-3 days.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries. International shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination.

faqs.question: Are there any shipping restrictions for certain products?
faqs.answer: Yes, some items like batteries, aerosols, or perishables may have shipping restrictions.

faqs.question: Is there a tracking number for my order?
faqs.answer: Yes, once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a tracking number and link.

faqs.question: How do I track my order's shipping progress?
faqs.answer: Use the tracking number provided in your email to view real-time updates on the carrierâ€™s website.

faqs.question: Do you offer shipping updates via email or SMS?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose to receive updates via email or SMS at checkout.

faqs.question: Can I specify a delivery date or time for my order?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer scheduled deliveries. We recommend using expedited shipping for faster delivery.

faqs.question: What happens if my package gets lost or damaged during shipping?
faqs.answer: Please contact our support team. We'll investigate with the carrier and issue a replacement or refund if necessary.

faqs.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing the order?
faqs.answer: If the order hasn't shipped yet, you can update the address by contacting customer support.

faqs.question: Can I reroute my package to a different address if I'm not available to receive it?
faqs.answer: In some cases, rerouting is possible through the shipping carrier. Contact us immediately for assistance.

faqs.question: What happens if I miss the delivery attempt?
faqs.answer: The carrier may attempt redelivery or leave a pickup notice. Follow the instructions on the delivery notice.

faqs.question: Can I combine multiple orders to save on shipping costs?
faqs.answer: Yes, if the orders are placed within a short time frame and haven't shipped yet, we can combine them.

faqs.question: Do you provide free shipping on orders over a certain amount?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free standard shipping on orders over $50 within the continental U.S.

faqs.question: Do you offer local pickup as an option?
faqs.answer: Yes, local pickup is available at select locations. Choose this option at checkout.

faqs.question: Do you offer signature confirmation upon delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, signature confirmation is available for an additional fee. You can select it during checkout.

faqs.question: Is there a shipping cut-off time for same-day dispatch?
faqs.answer: Yes, orders placed before 2 PM local warehouse time are eligible for same-day dispatch.

faqs.question: What should I do if my order hasn't arrived within the expected timeframe?
faqs.answer: Please check your tracking number and contact customer support for assistance.

faqs.question: Are there any delays expected during holidays or peak seasons?
faqs.answer: Yes, shipping may take longer during holidays and peak seasons. We recommend ordering early.

faqs.question: What is your return policy for items that arrive late or damaged?
faqs.answer: We offer full refunds or replacements for late or damaged items. Please contact support within 7 days of delivery.

steps: Ensure the tracking number is entered correctly.
Wait 12 hours after shipment for the tracking to activate.
Contact support if the issue persists.
Take a photo of the damaged package.
Contact support within 48 hours of delivery.
We will investigate and offer a refund or reshipment.

escalation.human_contact_trigger: User asks 2+ questions in a row or types 'talk to human'
